comments.body:
`arg` in these situations should be the LUB of the possible inputs for `Some` returns; this does not prevent it from matching wider selectors, but triggers appropriate errors on some impossible matches.

```suggestion
  def unapply(arg: Exception): Option[(Status, Metadata)] =
```
